content: When you've cleared the area, Bajie will launch into another anecdote. His monologue is soon interrupted by the bodies of the Revenants levitating and disappearing as if they're being recalled. Bajie immediately follows and tells you to catch up when you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass I'.
The content is as follows:
When you've cleared the area, Bajie will launch into another anecdote. His monologue is soon interrupted by the bodies of the Revenants levitating and disappearing as if they're being recalled. Bajie immediately follows and tells you to catch up when you can.
